img_text: PLEASE LET ME GO BACK TO THE WATER MIGHTY BEAR. IAM AN OLD FISH. LET ME SPEND MY LAST DAYS IN PEACE AND DIE IN THE WATER, WOULD NOT INSULT AN ANCIENT FISH SUCH AS YOu BY LETTING YOU DIE A DECREPIT THING WITH ITS SCALES FALLING OFF. TO NOT EAT YOU OUT OF PITY WOULo BE DISRESPECTFUL TO ONE SO GREAT YOUR POINTS ARE VALID FINISH ME QUICK, BEAR
